name: AIBC 2020 International Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain Conference
content: Conference official website：http://www.aibc.org Meeting time：February 19-21, 2020\. Meeting place：Hong Kong, China/Regal Oriental Hotel. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： to be added... Published by： 1\. AIBC 2020 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus, etc. Call for Papers： Information Retrieval. Intelligent System Architectures. Knowledge Representation. Knowledge-based Systems. Mechatronics. Multimedia & Cognitive Informatics. Neural Networks. Parallel Processing. Pattern Recognition. Alternative proof of work algorithms. Cyberattacks on blockchains. Economic impact on cyberattacks. Security and trust on permissioned blockchains. Scalability of blockchains. Smart contracts. Trade finance with blockchain. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : October 10, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : October 31, 2019\. Registration Deadline: November 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Ms.Candy Yang mailbox: aibc@acm-sg.org Tel: +86-021-59561560
